title: 2022-03-01 - Ukraine Hit with Novel ‘FoxBlade’ Trojan Hours Before Invasion
plain_text:
# Ukraine Hit with Novel ‘FoxBlade’ Trojan Hours Before Invasion

**[threatpost.com/microsoft-ukraine-foxblade-trojan-hours-before-russian-invasion/178702/](https://threatpost.com/microsoft-ukraine-foxblade-trojan-hours-before-russian-invasion/178702/)**

Twitter

Microsoft Word also leveraged in the email campaign, which uses a 22-year-old Office RCE
bug. [https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx](https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx)
